params.taskDescription:

  <mi>d</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C = \pi d</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>d</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">d</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Solve the formula <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mo>/</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mi>h</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A = \left( {1/2} \right)bh</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>b</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">b</annotation></semantics></math>.

    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>d</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>d</mi>

    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A = \left( {1/2} \right) {d_1}{d_2}</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

params.taskDescription:
Solve the formula <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>1</mn>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mo>/</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mi>h</mi>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msub>
          <mi>b</mi>
          <mn>1</mn>
        </msub>
      </mrow>
      <mo>+</mo>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msub>
          <mi>b</mi>
          <mn>2</mn>
        </msub>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A = \left( {1/2} \right)h\left( {{b_1} + {b_2}} \right)</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>b</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{b_1}</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Solve the formula <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>h</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>54</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mi>t</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mn>1</mn>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mo>/</mo>
    </mrow>
    <mn>2</mn>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mi>a</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">h = 54\,t + \left(1/2 \right) a</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>a</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">a</annotation></semantics></math>.
